Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets have a 46-35 record at home and an overall 89-73 record. The Los Angeles Dodgers have a 98-64 record overall and a.258 batting average, ranking third in the NL. The game is the 10th meeting between the two teams this season, with the Dodgers leading 6-3 in the series.
Others: The game is set to take place on Thursday, October 17, 2024, at 8:08 p.m. EDT. The Dodgers are favored with a betting line of -135, and the over/under is 7.5 runs.
